signature_matches.name: stealth_timeout
signature_matches.description: Possible date expiration check, exits too soon after checking local time

signature_matches.name: language_check_registry
signature_matches.description: Checks system language via registry key (possible geofencing)

signature_matches.name: long_commandline
signature_matches.description: Executed a very long command line or script command which may be indicative of chained commands or obfuscation

signature_matches.name: procmem_yara
signature_matches.description: Yara detections observed in process dumps, payloads or dropped files

signature_matches.name: antivm_generic_disk
signature_matches.description: Queries information on disks, possibly for anti-virtualization

signature_matches.name: cmdline_long_string
signature_matches.description: A script or command line contains a long continuous string indicative of obfuscation

signature_matches.name: powershell_command_suspicious
signature_matches.description: Attempts to execute suspicious powershell command arguments

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Suspicious Parent Double Extension File Execution
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detect execution of suspicious double extension files in ParentCommandLine

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Suspicious Execution of Powershell with Base64
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Commandline to launch powershell with a base64 payload
Detects non-interactive PowerShell activity by looking at the "powershell" process with a non-user GUI process such as "explorer.exe" as a parent.
